DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate efficacy clomiphene stair-step protocol induce ovulation woman polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS ) compare traditional protocol . Methods : This randomize control clinical trial Fertility clinic Al sadder teach hospital Al- Najaf city , Iraq . It include 140 woman meet inclusion criterion , divide two group ; 65 patient stair step protocol 75 patient traditional protocol .
DOC.brief_title: Clomiphene Stair-Step Protocol Ovulation Induction Women With Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Overall study design This randomized clinical trial use toss coin randomization technique carry subfertile woman attend Fertility Clinic AL Sadder Teaching Hospital Al- Najaf city , Iraq May 2010 till May 2011 . 170 infertile woman select time study participation write consent . Participant , recruitment randomization : The diagnostic criterion adopt PCOS accord Rotterdam ESHRE/ASRM sponsor PCOS consensus workshop group , 2004 base presence two follow three criterion : i.e . Oligo- and/or anovulation , hyperandrogenism clinical and/or biochemical , Polycystic ovary , ovary 12 follicle measure 2-9 mm indiameter increase ovarian volume ( > 10 cm3 ) transvaginal ultrasound ( 1 ) .
DOC.criteria: Female reproductive age subfertile diagnosis polycystic ovarian syndrome , serum FSHâ‰¤10 mIU/ml spontaneous menses positive bleed response progestagen withdrawal . Male factor ( moderate severe ) infertility , bilateral tubal blockage diagnose hystrosalpingographgy laparoscopy patient metformin medication .
DOC.keyword: Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome stair step traditional protocol
